1: <pb/><t>Ach co Diosal, ak' a watx'c'ulal ayon. Ok' wal a c'ul jin on, chaokab a c'ul on eloni.</t>
2: <t>Yet watx' a masanil nacionlak bay yulyibank'inal ti', chi yojtaknej el eb tzet chi yochej a c'ul, c'al colbanilej chak'a'.</t>
3: <pb/><t>Ach Dios, bitnokokab eb conoblak ayach. Masanil eb conoblak, bitnokokab eb ayach xin.</t>
4: <pb/><t>¡Awjokokab nacionlak yin tzalojc'ulal, tutun wal ach chak' cuenta eb conoblak yin tojolal! ¡Ach ton chekbaj nacionlak bay yulyibank'inal ti'!</t>
5: <pb/><t>¡Ach Dios, bitnokokab eb conoblak ayach! ¡Masanil eb conoblak, bitnokokab eb ayach xin!</t>
6: <pb/><t>Mayal satni el tx'otx' tx'otx'. Mayal yak' Dios is watx'c'ulal ayon.</t>
7: <t>¡Yak'okab Dios is watx'c'ulal ayon! ¡Ayokab yelapnok Cham bay masanil yulyibank'inal ti'!</t>
